name: Duplicate it
author: Smartzminds

sections.description:
When dealing with the creation of multiple duplicate entries for a single post, page, custom post, or page, the ‘Duplicate It Plugin’ proves invaluable. You no longer need to manually replicate numerous posts or pages to assess your website layout. Create one post, and with a simple click, you can append multiple entries to it. Similarly, if you want to include multiple entries on a page, it’s just a single click away. The plugin, a result of expert WordPress Plugin Development, ensures that all your settings and content are preserved in the duplicate, saved according to your selected options (draft, private, publish, pending).

⚡️ ATTRIBUTES

The principal attributes of this plugin are:

  • User Roles: User roles should be able to access duplicate pages or posts.
  • Status: Possibility to choose the duplicate posts or pages status.
  • Post Types: Duplicate Page Links in Post Types will be filtered to display.
  • Post Prefix: Possibility to include Post Prefix.
  • Post Suffix: Possibility to include a suffix.
  • Redirection: When clicking the clone URL, there is a redirect option.
  • In row edit sections: You can instantly make a copy of the post or page and return to the list by clicking the duplicate link under the post’s or page’s title in “Edit Posts” or “Edit Pages.”
  • Bulk-options: You can pick one or more items in “Edit Posts” or “Edit Pages” and then select “Duplicate” from the dropdown menu labelled “Bulk Actions” to copy them all at once.
  • Counter value: You can increase or decrease the counter value in “Edit Posts” or “Edit Pages,” and then select “Duplicate” in the edit row sections to create copies based on the counter value.

🚀 TYPICAL USE CASES

How to make use of a plugin’s features:

  1. The plugin must first be activated.
  2. In the admin dashboard, the plugin’s name is located under the settings tab.
  3. Make a new post or page, or use an existing page that you want to copy.
  4. When you click the link labelled “Duplicate,” a new post or page will be created and stored as a draft, a publish, a pending, or a private document, depending on the settings.
  5. You can choose which pages or posts you wish to duplicate with a single click by selecting the Duplicate All link found under the bulk options, followed by the Apply button. After that, duplicates will be created based on the posts or pages you’ve chosen.
  6. You may also choose which posts or pages you want to duplicate with a counter value by clicking on the duplicate option in the row edit sections and changing the number of copies. Copies will then be created based on the revised consultant value.

Minimum requirements for Duplicate Page

  • WordPress 3.3+
  • PHP 5.x
  • MySQL 5.x

If any problem occurs, please contact us at support@smartzminds.com.
sections.faq:
📝 Screenshots with Descriptions

Please review the following screenshot so that you can use plugins without any reservations.
1. Click “activate” to make the plugin active when you upload it.
2. After activating your plugin, the name will appear under the options tab. Click on it, then fill in the necessary information based on your demands, and then save modifications.
3. You can modify the status of your duplicate pages or posts under post status to suit your needs.
4. When you modify a post or page after saving your settings, the duplicate page option with a counter value will be available.
5.By selecting the duplicate option without first adjusting the counter’s limit, a alert box asking the user to set a value will appear.
6. A alert box will appear after choosing the counter value, notifying you that copies of your posts and pages have been successfully produced.
7. By using the Duplicate link located under the bulk options, you can easily pick the pages or posts you want to replicate with a single click.

sections.reviews:
Excellent Plug-in

By kary10 on February 9, 2023

This plug-in is really good. It makes the task of creating a duplicate post or page, easy and streamlined. The Smartzminds team, are first rate to deal with and they are very capable plug-in developers.

My favorite

By naresh147 on February 9, 2023

Simple and usefull. I always use this plugin on my sites.

short_description: Duplicate Posts, Pages and Custom Posts easily using single click
